Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I s'pose I'm partial, but the Eldin region is
a great place, if you hadn't noticed.

The place used to be nothin' more than a
big empty slab of volcanic rock.

Now you've got Cooke's <clr:0000>bistro <clr:ffff>making
food for folks from all over Hyrule.

And since YunoboCo has so many expert
miners workin for 'em, they sell <clr:0000>precious
stones <clr:ffff>at <clr:0000>rock-bottom prices<clr:ffff>.
There's also <clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>, the new
amusement park that just opened up.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>You don't have to go far round here to
have a great time!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>You traveling alone? I don't recommend it
for a Hylian especially.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When you're a traveler, fightin' monsters
comes with the territory!
SavedLv1_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>These monsters, I tell ya. All bark, no bite!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>No biggie. <sp:5:0:0>I'm a traveler, so I'm used to
gettin' the grit kicked outta me.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>It's way easier fightin' monsters with
someone else!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Another monster fight survived!<sp:5:1:0> Thanks
for helpin' me out!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>This place used to be nothin' more than a
big, empty slab of volcanic rock.

Now you've got Cooke's <clr:0000>bistro <clr:ffff>making
food for folks from all over Hyrule.

And since YunoboCo has so many expert
miners workin for 'em, they sell <clr:0000>precious
stones <clr:ffff>at <clr:0000>rock-bottom prices<clr:ffff>.
There's also <clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>, the new
amusement park that just opened up.

With all that goin' on, I hardly recognized
the place!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Whew!<sp:5:1:0> That'll teach me to underestimate
monsters...
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Too bad Cooke at the <clr:0000>bistro <clr:ffff>turns Hylians
away from his business.

<snd:Ease_00>That guy really knows his way around
a rock roast...
Talk_14_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>This place used to be nothin' more than a
big, empty slab of volcanic rock.

But now you've got YunoboCo with all its
expert miners, selling <clr:0000>precious stones <clr:ffff>at
<clr:0000>rock-bottom prices<clr:ffff>.
There's also <clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>, the new
amusement park that just opened up.

With all that goin' on, I hardly recognized
the place!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>This might sound strange comin' from a
Goron, but you really oughta stay away
from <clr:0000>Goron City <clr:ffff>right now.
Cooke, who's normally a nice fella, has
been turning Hylians away from his <clr:0000>bistro<clr:ffff>.

And all the workers over at <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
have been slackin' off and eating these
<clr:0000>weird rocks<clr:ffff>...
I heard things had gotten bad at home,
so I rushed back.

Turns out everything I'd been hearing
was true...
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>A monster as terrifying as that...<sp:5:1:0> I don't
have the strength to stand up to it!
Failed00: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Oof, woozy... <sp:5:1:0>I think I blacked out there.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Cooke, who's normally a nice fella, has
been turning Hylians away from his <clr:0000>bistro<clr:ffff>.

And all the workers from <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>,
they've been slackin' off and eating
<clr:0000>strange rocks<clr:ffff>.
So, this might sound strange comin' from
a Goron, but you really oughta stay away
from <clr:0000>Gorons <clr:ffff>right now.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>The joys of explorin' this great big world
of ours... <sp:5:1:0>Ouch...

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>You don't have to go far round here to

Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Here!<sp:5:1:0> A little somethin' for your trouble.
